abstract: Soccer Roundup; Manchester United beats Liverpool, 2-1, in Premier League; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Gerrard, Liverpool’s captain, was apologetic after being sent off for stamping on Ander Herrera in Manchester United’s 2-1 victory.

headline.main: Manchester United Beats Liverpool, and Steven Gerrard Is Tossed
headline.print_headline: United Beats Liverpool, and Gerrard Is Tossed

snippet: Gerrard, Liverpool’s captain, was apologetic after being sent off for stamping on Ander Herrera in Manchester United’s 2-1 victory.
